languages.text: {n}Идира вперивается в вас взглядом — и ее брови начинают ползти вверх.{/n} "Да чтоб мне... или я совсем рехнулась, или... ой нет, это же совсем придурь! Лорд-капитан в теле придворной девицы? Ага, так я и поверила, голосочки!" {n}Псайкер начинает тереть глаза, словно пытаясь прочистить их.{/n}

{n}Idira stares at you — and her eyebrows start to creep upward.{/n} "I'll be damned... either I'm completely out of my mind, or... No, that's just insane! The Lord Captain, in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Идира вперивается в вас взглядом — и ее брови начинают ползти вверх.{/n} "Да чтоб мне... или я совсем рехнулась, или... ой нет, это же совсем придурь! Лорд-капитан в теле придворной девицы? Ага, так я и поверила, голосочки!" {n}Псайкер начинает тереть глаза, словно пытаясь прочистить их.{/n}

The Lord Captain in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}

{n}Idira stares at you — and her eyebrows start to creep upward.{/n} "I'll be damned... either I'm completely out of my mind, or that's... the Lord Captain? In the body of that court lady? That's... How?" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}

{n}Idira stares at you — and her eyebrows start to creep upward.{/n} "I'll be damned... either I'm completely out of my mind, or... No, that's just insane! The Lord Captain in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}

{n}Idira stares at you — and her eyebrows start to creep upward.{/n} "I'll be damned... either I'm completely out of my mind, or... No, that's just insane! The Lord Captain, in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉紧盯着你，慢慢扬起了眉毛。{/n}“真是活见鬼了……要么是我彻底疯了，要么……我去，这怎么可能！舰长大人？在那个侍女的身体里面？嘿，说悄悄话的家伙们，快看看！这可真是绝了！”{n}她揉起了眼睛，仿佛要把自己的眼睛揉掉一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you — and her eyebrows start to creep upward.{/n} "I'll be damned... either I'm completely out of my mind, or... No, that's just insane! The Lord Captain, in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉紧盯着你，慢慢扬起了眉毛。{/n}“真是活见鬼了……要么是我彻底疯了，要么……我去，这怎么可能！舰长大人？在那个侍女的身体里面？嘿，说悄悄话的家伙们，快看看！这可真是绝了！”{n}她揉起了眼睛，仿佛要把自己的眼睛揉掉一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira te mira fijamente y poco a poco va enarcando las cejas cada vez más.{/n} «Que me aspen... o me he vuelto completamente loca, o... ¡Menuda locura! ¿{rt_mf|El|La} Lord Capitán? ¿En el cuerpo de esa cortesana? ¡Eso sí que es raro, susurros!». {n}La psíquica se frota los ojos como intentando despejarse la vista.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you — and her eyebrows start to creep upward.{/n} "I'll be damned... either I'm completely out of my mind, or... No, that's just insane! The Lord Captain, in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira te mira fijamente y poco a poco va enarcando las cejas cada vez más.{/n} «Que me aspen... o me he vuelto completamente loca, o... ¡Menuda locura! ¿{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán? ¿En el cuerpo de esa cortesana? ¡Eso sí que es raro, susurros!». {n}La psíquica se frota los ojos como intentando despejarse la vista.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İdira sana bakıyor, kaşları yukarı doğru kalkmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Lanet olsun... Ya aklımı tamamen kaçırdım ya da... Hayır, delilik bu! Lord Kaptan. O saraylı leydinin bedeninde mi? Saçmalamayın fısıltılarım!" {n}Gözlerini sanki temizlemeye çalışıyormuş gibi ovuşturmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you — and her eyebrows start to creep upward.{/n} "I'll be damned... either I'm completely out of my mind, or... No, that's just insane! The Lord Captain, in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira sana bakıyor, kaşları yukarı doğru kalkmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Lanet olsun... Ya aklımı tamamen kaçırdım ya da... Hayır, delilik bu! Lord Kaptan. O saraylı leydinin bedeninde mi? Saçmalamayın fısıltılarım!" {n}Gözlerini sanki temizlemeye çalışıyormuş gibi ovuşturmaya başlıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}イディラはあなたをじっと見る。そして、彼女の眉は少しずつ上に上がる。{/n}「なんてこった…あたいの頭がおかしくなっちまったか、あなたがロード・キャプテン？侍女の体の中にいるのかい？一体…どうやって？信じられない」{n}彼女はまるで目をきれいにしようとするかのように、目をこすり始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you — and her eyebrows start to creep upward.{/n} "I'll be damned... either I'm completely out of my mind, or... No, that's just insane! The Lord Captain, in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはあなたをじっと見る。そして、彼女の眉は少しずつ上に上がる。{/n}「なんてこった…あたいの頭がおかしくなっちまったか、あなたがロード・キャプテン？侍女の体の中にいるのかい？一体…どうやって？」{n}彼女はまるで目をきれいにしようとするかのように、目をこすり始める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira vous dévisage en haussant un sourcil.{/n} « Nom d'un grox... soit je perds complètement les pédales... soit... Non, c'est impossible ! {rt_mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine}... dans le corps de cette dame de la cour ? Et puis quoi encore, les murmures ?! » {n}Elle se frotte les yeux comme pour essayer d'y voir plus clair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you — and her eyebrows start to creep upward.{/n} "I'll be damned... either I'm completely out of my mind, or... No, that's just insane! The Lord Captain, in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira vous dévisage en haussant un sourcil.{/n} « Nom d'un grox... soit je perds complètement les pédales... soit... Non, c'est impossible ! {rt_mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine}... dans le corps de cette dame de la cour ? Et puis quoi encore, les murmures ?! » {n}Elle se frotte les yeux comme pour essayer d'y voir plus clair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira starrt dich an ... und hebt langsam ihre Augenbrauen.{/n} "Ich will verdammt sein ... entweder verliere ich endgültig den Verstand oder ... Nein, das ist verrückt! Der Lord Captain im Körper dieser Hofdame? Das ist wild, Flüsterstimmen." {n}Sie reibt sich die Augen, als würde sie dadurch klarer sehen.{/n}

The Lord Captain, in the body of that court lady? That's rich, whispers!" {n}She starts rubbing her eyes as if trying to clear them.{/n}
